text: Micah Sierra "Katt" Williams (born September 2, 1971) is an American stand-up comedian, rapper, singer and actor. He acted as Money Mike in Friday After Next (2002). He also played Bobby Shaw in My Wife and Kids. In 2007, he played Lord Have Mercy in Norbit. Williams was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from Ohio Category:Actors from Ohio Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:People from Cincinnati
title: Katt Williams
